name: WP AutoTags
author: Zhys

sections.description:
è‹±æ–‡:Often publish articles and updates people loves forgets to set tags when editing an article, the article automatically add keywords tag. tag extraction based on TF-IDF implementation. Built-in TF-IDF interface does not work when you try to find an existing tag in WordPress. If found, these markers are added to the post automatically each time you save the post.
Psï¼šGo to \”SettingsÂ» Writing \” Configure. TF-IDF only supports English and Chinese.Plugin work in PHP5.5+.
Visit Official page.

sections.installation:
1. Download zip file
  2. Upload the WP AutoTags plugin to your blog
  3. Activate it
sections.faq: Please leave a message to plugins release page :). Visit Comments Page.
